author: Staff Reporter
text:
Poet O.N.V. Kurup was cremated with full state honours at the Shanthi Kavadam electric crematorium here on Monday at 11 a.m.

His son V. Rajeevan performed the last rites. Kerala Chief Minister Oommen Chandy, his Cabinet colleagues, Leader of the Opposition V.S. Achuthanandan, Chief Secretary and District Collector were present.

The poet’s body was wrapped in the Tricolour and he was accorded a 21-gun salute by the Kerala Police.

Earlier, a large number of people made a beeline for the poet’s residence. Among the visitors was singer K.J. Yesudas. Several legislators also paid their last respects.
title: O.N.V. Kurup cremated with full state honours
